resources.string: License for fonts in the app:

Check out the code to this app:

Before you begin, swing your device around to reset sensors
Landmarker was created by Anthony Tripaldi at the Google Creative Lab. Go to androidexperiments.com to see other experiments.
Code is open sourced and can be found at\nhttps://github.com/googlecreativelab/landmarker
